results.title: Metformin alleviates the calcification of aortic valve interstitial cells through activating the PI3K/AKT pathway in an AMPK dependent way
results.text_hl: This study aims to verify whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Calcification_of</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562942 @@@aortic calcification@@@ through the @GENE_PIK3CA @GENE_5290 @@@PI3K@@@/@GENE_AKT1 @GENE_207 @@@AKT@@@ signaling pathway.
